com.versant.odmg
Class ODMGSession

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.fund.Constants
      com.versant.fund.MSessionVar
          com.versant.fund.Capi
              com.versant.fund.SynchronizedCapi
                  com.versant.fund.MSession
                      com.versant.fund.FundSession
                          com.versant.trans.TransSession
                              com.versant.odmg.ODMGSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassBuilder, Session, SessionWithDatabase
public class ODMGSession
extends TransSession

The ODMGSession class is a wrapper class for an underlying VERSANT session object. Each ODMG Transaction, after it begins, bears a one to one correspondence with an ODMGSession instance. You can invoke additional methods on an ODMG Transaction by recovering the ODMGSession from the Transaction instance, and calling the VERSANT specific methods that it contains.

Applications developed with the ODMG 2.0 Java binding use the JVI Session class. The Transaction class contains an ODMGSession instance in it. You can access it by calling the session() method.

The ODMGSession contains methods that encapsulate additional VERSANT specific functionality that is not included in the ODMG 2.0 Java binding specifications.

Method Detail

connectDatabase

public void connectDatabase(Database db)
                     throws ODMGException
Connect to a database.

This method is a VERSANT addition to supplement the Transaction class specification outlined in the ODMG 2.0 bindings. It associates a database to the VERSANT session (which is obtained from the Transaction instance by invoking the session() method.)

Parameters:
db - The database to associated with the transaction and/or session.
Throws:
ODMGException - DatabaseClosedException if the database being associated with this transaction/session is not open.
DatabaseConnectException, - a run-time exception, if the database is already connected to this transaction and/or session.
TransactionNotInProgressException, - a run-time exception, if the transaction that contains this session is not open.
ODMGException

disconnectDatabase

public void disconnectDatabase(Database db)
                        throws ODMGException
Disconnect database. This method is a VERSANT addition to the Transaction class specification outlined in the ODMG 2.0 bindings. Disassociates a database from the VERSANT session (which is obtained from the Transaction instance by invoking the session () method.)

Parameters:
db - The database being disassociated from this transaction.
Throws:
DatabaseClosedException() - if the database being disassociated from this transaction/session is not open.
DatabaseDisconnectException() - if this database is the Transaction/Session Default Database.
TransactionNotInProgressException(), - a run-time exception, if the transaction containing this session is not open.
DatabaseNotConnectedException(), - a run-time exception, if the database is not currently connected with this transaction and/or session.
ODMGException
